name: Elemental Boi VR (Demo)
description:
Get a taste of what it's like to be an Earth Bender!

This demo is at an early development stage. The aim of this demo, is to get a small taste of earth bending. Leave your suggestions to my discord server: https://discord.gg/8p8b3TbVxx

Download Instructions:

PCVR:

- Download and Extract the .zip file to a folder. Click on the "Elemental Boi (Demo).exe" file to start the game.

- Make sure that the oculus quest is connected to the pc using the oculus link.

APK: 

- Download the .apk file.

- Open SideQuest. Make sure that the headset is correctly setup with SideQuest. 

- Drag the .apk file to the green dot on the top left of the SideQuest User interface.

- Go back to your VR headset. Click on the Apps menu.

- Click on the drop down menu on the top right corner and click Unknown Sources. 

- There should be a file named: Elemental Boi (Demo). Click on it and you should enter the game!
